param.name: jobid
param.description: the ID of the asychronous job

response.name: accountid
response.description: the account that executed the async command

response.name: created
response.description: the created date of the job

response.name: jobinstanceid
response.description: the unique ID of the instance/entity object related to the job

response.name: jobinstancetype
response.description: the instance/entity object related to the job

response.name: jobprocstatus
response.description: the progress information of the PENDING job

response.name: jobresultcode
response.description: the result code for the job

response.name: jobstatus
response.description: the current job status-should be 0 for PENDING

response.name: userid
response.description: the user that executed the async command

response.name: jobid
response.description: the ID of the async job
